summary: With this mod you can summon 16 Big Cats Mounts and Followers (2 Lions,2 Lioness,2 Panthers,2 Leopards,7 Tigers,Spectral Sabrecat) wherever you want + You can find 8 Companions in the 5 Stables.No DLC required.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00]versions 3.0[/color] and [color=#00ff00]3.0.1 BIS (No Followers)[/color] (No DLC required)

"Big Cats" allow you to summon 16 Big Cats Mounts and -simple- Followers (2 Lions, 2 Lioness, 2 Panthers, 2 Leopards, 7 Tigers, Spectral Sabrecat) wherever you want + You can find the 8 Companions/Followers (with speech and New -free- Sounds) in the 5 Stables (Whiterun, Markath, Riften, Solitude, Windhelm)

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Big Cats"


[color=#00ff00]Version 4.1 DLC DAWNGUARD REQUIRED[/color] 23 Big Cats -Adds 7 new Cats: a Dawnguard Armored Tiger, a Saddled Sabre Tiger, a Lioness with Leather Collar, a Mountain Lion, a Leopard B, a Snow Leopard B, a Black Panther- + Adds Clarence as Follower/Companion in the Katla Farm (near Nala) [i]You must delete the "old" version[/i]


To access in Vvardenfell (Morrowind) and Cyrodiil (Oblivion) with these mounts you have the 2 mods WIP: [url=http://morroblivion.com/]SKYWIND and SKYBLIVION [/url]

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012103013516616015485609.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/21//18012103013516616015485609.jpg[/img][/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/7ARjZ7n.gif[/img]


[color=#ff0000][b] INSTALLATION[/b] [i] (very important):[/i][/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 17 (or 24) books (look at the screens)...(Normally, this is done automatically !)

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)


You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXX” and the "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Big Cats", at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour (15' for the Spectral Sabrecat)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rz58NCc.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000]Credits[/color]

[color=#ff0000] FrankTheFish [/color] (Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12647 ]Prides of Skyrim [/url] ) for the Lions, Scar texture, the Panther texture and mesh edit (“NEW addition of tail and teeth on panther mesh were not my own”) and the Lioness ( “You may use my Lions and other big cats as long as proper credit is given”).

The textures of lions are from [color=#ff0000] Bellyache [/color] ; Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621] Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack [/url]("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me").

New Lions and Lioness Nala models from the team (-in the credits of FrankTheFish-):

"[color=#ff0000]Targaryen [/color](for the Mane of the lion)
[color=#ff0000]tumbajamba [/color](for the Tail)
[color=#ff0000]TreasureChest [/color](for the Teeth)
[color=#ff0000]DVAted [/color](for the effort of making the new model possible)"

"Also another thanks to [color=#ff0000]DVAted's team[/color] for the Tiger model:
Targaryen, tumbajamba & TreasureChest (model)
DVAted (textures and model direction)"

[color=#ff0000]AlienSlof[/color] (Mod [url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/forum/index.php?topic=3842.0]Slofs Sabrecats[/url])for the texture of the Snow Leopard (“Use these textures freely”)

[color=#ff0000]muppetpuppet[/color] (Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10473]Tiger retexture and skin addon for sabrecat race [/url]) for the meshe and the texture of the Sabre Tiger (“enjoy free to use”)

[color=#ff0000]Testiger2 and XP32[/color] for the mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45542/?]Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix [/url] ("Permission : Free according to original tweaker/modder -testiger2-")

[color=#ff0000]Tumbajamba [/color] for the Mesh and the texture of the Armored Tiger (« i decided to upload all my unreleased mount models as a modder resources ») in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?]Armored SabreCat Mount [/url]

[color=#ff0000]testiger2[/color] for the Meshes/Textures of the White Tiger (with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57413/?] sliceandkill [/url]), Saddled White Tiger, Leather Armored Tiger, Iron Armored Tiger, Panther with gold collar, Dawnguard Armored Tiger, Saddled Sabre Tiger, Lioness with Leather Collar, in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68149/?] TesTiger's Mesh Resources [/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/38841/?] Eldroth [/url] for the Model of the Lioness Clarence (Mesh from Eldroth/Julien; derivative work based on the Tera games* from -“En Masse Entertainment” and “Bluehole Studio”- and the textures from [url=http://www.slofslair.co.uk/index.php?page=news] AlienSlof [/url])

[color=#ff0000]Mihail Romanov [/color] for the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88007] Mountain Lions and Panthers [/url]

New -Free- Sounds : [url=http://www.universal-soundbank.com/] universal-soundbank/ [/url]; [url=http://www.sound-fishing.net/bruitages_animaux.html] Sound Fishing [/url] ;[url=http://www.pawsonline.info/feline_sounds.htm] pawsonline.info [/url] and [url=http://bigcats2.tripod.com/Cat_Sounds.html] bigcats2.tripod.com [/url]



[color=#ff0000]IMPORTANT [/color]

1) If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

2) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

3) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not



[color=#ff0000][b]Videos[/b][/color] with the Big Cats

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]yqncTnyC0UA[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-



->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]--pXQ6YuCxo[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

files.changelogHtml:
New in the version 4.0 DAWNGUARD EDITION (ONLY): Adds 4 new summonable mounts (Mountain Lion + Leopard B + Snow Leopard B + Black Panther) + minor changes

New in the version 3.4.1 DAWNGUARD EDITION (ONLY): "invisible" Clarence fixed

New in the version 3.4 DAWNGUARD EDITION (ONLY): Adds Clarence as Follower/Companion in the Katla Farm (near Nala)

New in the version 3.3.2 DAWNGUARD EDITION (ONLY): Adds a Dawnguard Armored Tiger, a Saddled Sabre Tiger, a Lioness with Leather Collar

New in the version 3.0: Adds White Tiger, Saddled White Tiger, Leather Armored Tiger, Iron Armored Tiger, Panther with gold collar, Lioness Clarence + New Sounds for the followers

New in the version 2.2: You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Big Cats"

New in the version 2.1: Adds a summonable Armored Tiger by tumbajamba

New in the version 2.0.1: Adds Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix by testiger2
